meanings.definition: A person who hides or conceals something.
meanings.sent1: The hiders in the game were very good at staying out of sight.
meanings.sent2: The hiders found a great hiding spot behind the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The hiders giggled as they tried to stay hidden from their friends.
meanings.sent4: The hiders were like shadows, blending into the background effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The hiders were like secret agents, disappearing without a trace.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the verb 'to hide', meaning to put or keep out of sight.
meanings.sent1: We hiders behind the curtains to surprise our friend.
meanings.sent2: The children hiders in the closet during the game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent3: The cat hiders under the bed whenever it's time for a bath.
meanings.sent4: The stars hiders behind the clouds on a stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The magician hiders a coin in his hand, ready to perform a trick.
